content:
Dame Margot pauses her lance-wielding actions, and her face breaks into a warm smile. Dandelion, the poodle, seems to perk up as well, wagging its tail excitedly.

Dame Margot: "Ah, a weary traveler seeking companionship! I, Dame Margot, Knight of Yore, and my faithful steed Dandelion are always happy to befriend kind souls. This place can be quite daunting, but together, we shall face the challenges of the Labyrinth."

As you exchange pleasantries, you can't help but notice the various objects at the bottom of the cistern, the dripping shaft in the center of the ceiling, and the stone seal at the bottom of the cistern.

What would you like to do next?
